Customer Experience 💪🏽🖥️🇺🇸

May 10, 2018

  • civictech
  • episode
  • customer experience

Kevin Carter, Digital Service Expert with the United States Digital Service (USDS) joins us at the Pentagon. We’ll engage in a discussion about how customer and employee experience concepts can be combined to improve government services for agencies across government.
